tool_description: Calculates optimal reorder points and quantities for inventory items based on usage patterns, lead times, and safety stock requirements.

item_name.description: Name of the inventory item to calculate reorder point for

average_daily_usage.description: Average daily consumption of the item

supplier_lead_time_days.description: Days between order placement and delivery

safety_stock_days.description: Extra days of stock to maintain as buffer (1-30)

usage_variability.description: Coefficient of variation in daily usage (0-2)

error_messages: Invalid usage rate: average_daily_usage must be a positive number.
Invalid lead time: supplier_lead_time_days must be a positive integer.
Invalid safety stock: safety_stock_days must be between 1 and 30 days.
Invalid variability: usage_variability must be between 0 and 2.
Item not found: The specified item_name is not in the inventory system.
usage: Provide item name, average daily usage, and supplier lead time. Optionally adjust safety stock buffer and usage variability. The tool calculates when and how much to reorder.

reorder_point.description: Inventory level at which to place new order

economic_order_quantity.description: Optimal quantity to order each time
